page.title: 07School Staff
page.content: We have two full time teachers,Mrs Macdonald the Headmistress,and Mrs Hibbard the assistant teacher.Mrs Macdonald teaches the top class of 7-9 year olds and Mrs Hibbard the Infants' class.Mrs Walker comes on Friday mornings to teach us Drama.We have a clerical assistant,Mrs Martin-Smith,for 5 hours and she also works for 7 hours as a welfare assistant.Mrs Caldwell is the other welfare assistant and she works for 6 hours.Mrs Cotton is the cleaner for 10 hours and Mrs Gurnett is the dinner supervisor and kitchen helper.Mrs Boughton is the cook and she is retiring after 34 years. The Reverend Wilmot comes for Tuesday Assembly.Mr Galvin comes to help us use new programs on the computer.Mr Sparrow,the Science Adviser,has looked at our experiments.
